column2: Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development

column1: a: Includes Christmas Island, Cocos (Keeling) Islands and Norfolk Island.
e: Includes Abkhazia and South Ossetia.
g: Includes Agalega, Rodrigues and Saint Brandon.
i: Includes Svalbard and Jan Mayen Islands.
l: Includes Canary Islands, Ceuta and Melilla.
